outcome_space.description: Ethereum EIP-1559 base fee per gas (BASEFEE), contract-month average

base_case.condition: What is the average Ethereum EIP-1559 BASEFEE (base fee per gas) for the contract month {observation.reference_date} (UTC), in Gwei?
base_case.fsp_resolution: This is a contract-month average. The averaging window is from the previous monthly expiry to the current monthly expiry, where each expiry is 08:00:00 UTC on the last Friday of the month. FSP equals the arithmetic average of the Ethereum L1 block header field `baseFeePerGas` (Wei) across all blocks whose block timestamp is in the UTC interval [previous_expiry, current_expiry). The result is scaled to Gwei by dividing by 1e9 (Wei * 1e-9). Note: this product settles BASEFEE only (excludes priority fees/tips) and is USDC-settled (does not include the ETHUSD FX leg).

edge_cases.condition: The data source is unavailable, rate-limited, or returns no blocks for more than 48 hours after {observation.release_date}.
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: FSP is UNRESOLVED (or fallback after fallback_time).

outcome_space.source_name: Ethereum L1 block headers (via Blockchair API)

oracle_config.description: Oracle config: compute avg(base_fee_per_gas) over the contract-month window (Wei)
